body_html: fyi, there are random ops available in sample methods from tf.contrib.distributions. although in general, i'm not sure what the plan is for tf.random_normal([]) vs distributions.Normal(mu=0.0, sigma=1.0).sample()
body_text: fyi, there are random ops available in sample methods from tf.contrib.distributions. although in general, i'm not sure what the plan is for tf.random_normal([]) vs distributions.Normal(mu=0.0, sigma=1.0).sample()
body: fyi, there are random ops available in sample methods from `tf.contrib.distributions`. although in general, i'm not sure what the plan is for `tf.random_normal([])` vs `distributions.Normal(mu=0.0, sigma=1.0).sample()`
